learning_objectives.description: Understand the need to check for errors after data transmission and how errors can occur.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Errors may result from interference (data loss, gain, or change).

learning_objectives.description: Describe error detection: parity check (odd/even), checksum, and echo check.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Includes parity byte and parity block check.

learning_objectives.description: Describe use of check digits to detect data entry errors and give examples such as ISBN and bar codes.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Check digits help detect errors in manual data entry (e.g. ISBN, bar codes).

learning_objectives.description: Describe ARQ (Automatic Repeat Query) to establish error-free data receipt.
